records.context_note: A migrant boat with approximately 30 people was detected in Greek territorial waters near Samos Island. Frontex assets accompanied the boat, which was later intercepted by the HCG. The boat eventually altered its course towards Turkish Territorial Waters to avoid interception, which the FRO considers possible. However, concerns were raised and confirmed by FRO that the HCG performed dangerous and disproportionate manoeuvres, creating waves that significantly impacted the small migrant boat and potentially endangered the migrants.
records.evidence_quote: The reports of the Frontex deployed [redacted] and the HCG on the same incident raised questions as to what happened to a migrant boat with approx. 30 migrants. The boat was [redacted] and accompanied by the [redacted] vessel until it was handed over to the HCG [redacted] inside the Greek territorial waters. The migrants later ended up in Turkish Territorial Waters (TTW) with the Greek authorities reporting that the boat had 'altered course towards TTW to avoid the interception'.
